name: slider-gallery-block
description: Enable a Slider Block Style for the Gallery Block in WordPress Block Editor.

scripts.bundle: dir-archiver --src . --dest ../slider-gallery-block.zip --exclude .DS_Store .stylelintrc.json .eslintrc .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore README.md composer.json composer.lock node_modules vendor package-lock.json package.json .travis.yml phpcs.xml.dist sass style.css.map yarn.lock tsconfig.json prepros.config webpack.config.js

author: indithemes
